review: A little crashey and limited, I expected smoother video from Google Play on this device.  Solid performance on YouTube though.
author: GregS

review: Not as glorious as described. Must constantly use your cellphone to manipulate the device.
author: John

review: the best short money you can spend on a friend or a gift for you works perfect and cheap...great job Google...

review: Awesome. Convenient. Advanced. Perfect for travel as well.
author: Sharif Ahmed

review: Marvelous device. Don't know how they did it but it works. I'm still trying to find a way to put what I take from my "My Pictures/Videos" or "Documents" files and put it on the TV screen.
author: DEL "Gabriel's Oboe"

review: Great delivery time! Exactly as advertised!  Great price! Need I say more?
author: Freddy Martinez
